description: When you cast a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0 this round.
name: Heimerdinger
